batchCalculateSimilarity(address[]).details: Batch similarity calculation for multiple users

params.targets: Array of user addresses to calculate similarity with

returns.requestIds: Array of match request IDs for each target

calculateSimilarity(address).details: Calculate similarity between two users using encrypted bitwise operations

params.targetUser: Address of the user to compare with

returns.requestId: The ID of the match request

deleteProfile().details: Emergency function to remove a user's profile

getMatchCount(address).details: Get match count for a user

returns.isMatch: Whether the match result is true
returns.matchDecrypted: Whether the match result has been decrypted
returns.processed: Whether the match request has been processed
returns.scoreDecrypted: Whether the similarity score has been decrypted
returns.timestamp: The timestamp of the match request

getMyMatches().details: Get user's matches (only callable by the user themselves)

returns._0: Array of addresses that matched with the caller

getTotalUsers().details: Get total number of registered users

hasProfile(address).details: Check if a user has a profile

returns._0: True if user has a profile

isAlreadyMatched(address,address).details: Check if two users are already matched

returns._0: True if users are already matched

processMatchDecryption(bytes32).details: Retrieve and process decrypted match result

params.requestId: The ID of the match request

processScoreDecryption(bytes32).details: Retrieve and process decrypted similarity score

params.requestId: The ID of the match request

requestMatchDecryption(bytes32).details: Request decryption of match result (whether users match)

params.requestId: The ID of the match request
The ID of the match request

submitProfile((uint256,uint8,uint8,bytes.details: Submit user profile with encrypted interests bitmap
